Khonkolor:::

"But we can'yt leave him here...!" said Khonkolor "He's wounded and 
unconceus... If we leave him, he might die... Altough he think as 
Decepticon, he was once Maximal... Well perhaps we can... we can 
reprogram him or fo something to become again in the old Condor that 
we met... What do you think about Hot Rod? "


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He steped back a bit.
> "I believe so, Khonkolor. We cant kill him, so I guess we just leave
> him."
